attributes.action: National Service for repeat young offenders 18 month - 2 years
attributes.additional_details: Clearly ASBO's, and the prisons (holiday camps these days) do not sort out these dangerous young people. National Service will rehabilitate offenders with team work and disiplin being instilled. Surley this is a better plan than the current system of young offenders going to prison and mixing with other disgusting individuals whilst they play PlayStaing and go to the gym.... wonder why that does not work? They are not worried about the concequences!
